author: Adrian Collins
description:
Last Updated on November 28, 2025 Grimdark Magazine Issue #45 is here and ready for pre-orders. This quarter we are going all in on cyberpunk and SF, featuring some of the best short fiction writers in the genre injecting gritty and horrifying futures to your very eyes. Our first ever print issue! After 44 quarterly […]

title: Grimdark Magazine Issue #45 cover reveal, pre-orders, and print subscriptions

author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
Unless you’ve been living under a rock, C.S. Pacat’s Captive Prince Trilogy will surely have come across your radar. It’s one of those stories that wears a reputation like a blood-spattered cloak, trailing whispers of brutality, decadence, and morally tangled relationships in its wake. And honestly, I did not think Captive Prince was going to […]

title: REVIEW: Captive Prince by C.S. Pacat
